Name: Blade Bros IMPACT!
About the game: Blade Bros IMPACT! 'Welcome to Blade Bros Impact!, a action rpg game with several essences from the classics rpg from 16 and 32 bits era!, enjoy dynamic battle, scary bosses, get more powerful by gain levels, get swords, rods, bows, axes and so forth!. Blade Bros Impact is a partial open world game, so you have a lot maps to explore, discover secret places, weapons and items. Also the character has several skills, where you get feels into a anime, blast melee skills, magic skills, summon skills and a lot thing there wait for you!. Key features: - Smooth action rpg. - A lot things into game glossary. - Friendly grinding (level). - A fun gameflow (its a short game, but with about 5-8 hours of gampeplay depending on your game skills, however without a fillers plot). - 16/32 bits pixel art graphics. - Soundtrack with a lot of essence from classics rpg. - A cool and vast world to be explored.'
